Detailed Description

This class is used to implement functionality that needs to be run during static destruction.

It can be promoted to occur before other tasks by calling FiniJob::runAll.

This is currently called by MemTracker to ensure memory has been cleaned up before it does any accounting.

Objects of this type are deleted immediately after their fini method is called.
